channel.title: Knitr on Dr. Mowinckel's
channel.description: Recent content in Knitr on Dr. Mowinckel's

item.title: Rmarkdown Child Templates
item.description: Generate automated reports in Rmarkdown by creating reusable child templates. Learn to call child documents from a main Rmd using knitr and environment variables, enabling efficient and flexible report generation for survey data analysis. Follow this guide to streamline your workflow and reduce repetitive code.
